step_data.thought: I see that I'm already on the order view page. I initially tried to navigate to the Credit Memos tab (which I did successfully), and then navigated back to the Information tab. Looking at the current state of the page, I can see that I'm now viewing the order details under the Information tab. The URL in the RootWebArea shows 'http://127.0.0.1:7780/admin/sales/order/view/order_id/2/' which confirms I'm on the order details page. Since I've successfully navigated to the order details page from the credit memo view (by clicking on the Information tab), I've completed the requested task.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully navigated to the order details page. You are currently viewing the Information tab which contains all the order details for order #000000002.')
